name: Last Step (Aramsantze)
description:
The sequel to Revealed, continues the journey

As a longer game than before, but it's still a small game.

Duration: 30 minutes

----

Control

Left mouse for point and click 

ASWD/Arrow key and space for top-down and platformer

press Space in story piece.

press any button in animation piece
